Salud Fisica y Espiritual: El Milagro de la Curacion
Bruce Goldberg. Llewellyn Espanol, $12.95 (239pp) ISBN 978-1-56718-263-7
Published in 1997, Soul Healing (called Sosegar el alma in Spanish) proved so popular that a revised edition is appearing this year in both languages. This instructional guide recommends a range of techniques (yoga, shamanic healing, or acupuncture, for instance) for mending your soul.
